DOC.brief_summary: Study to compare the level of blood pressure control in hypertensive, hypertensive diabetics and hypertensive with renal insufficiency (observed data) in the study population, with the objectives of the High Authority for Health recommendations (benchmark)
DOC.brief_title: Pharmaco-epidemiological Study Describing a Population of Hypertensive Patients Treated With a Fixed-dose Combination of Telmisartan and Hydrochlorothiazide
DOC.criteria: Hypertensive patients already treated for at least 1 month with Telmisartan plus hydrochlorothiazide, consulting the physician consecutively for whatever reason
